articles.title: Alberta reports 53 more cases of measles, surpasses 900 total cases since March
articles.description: Data from the Alberta government's dashboard shows 53 more measles cases were confirmed over the weekend, bringing Alberta's total to 932.
articles.content:
Data from the Alberta government's dashboard shows 53 more cases were confirmed over the weekend, bringing Alberta's total to 932.
EDMONTON — Alberta has surpassed 900 cases of measles since the beginning of March.

articles.title: At least 37 Palestinians killed in Gaza food site shooting, local authorities say
articles.description: Death toll is highest yet reported in near-daily shootings since US-backed group began distributing food in territory
articles.content:
At least 37 Palestinians were killed on Monday in new shootings in Gaza near food distribution centres run by private US contractors guarded by Israeli troops, local authorities said.

articles.title: Police appeal after attempted rape at Finchley Road cinema
articles.description: Police are searching for a man after a woman reported an attempted rape in a north London cinema.
articles.content:
Detectives have released CCTV footage of a man they wish to speak to following an attempted rape at a cinema in north-west London, on Wednesday afternoon.

articles.title: Israel and Iran carry out further strikes as Iranian state TV knocked off air
articles.description: A news anchor in Tehran is seen fleeing a TV studio as Israel and Iran launch missile strikes at each other for the fourth successive day.
articles.content:
An Iranian state television broadcast has been bombed live on air as Israel and Iran stepped up missile attacks against each other for the fourth straight day.
